name: alerts
description: Connect to the Via alerts server to create, update, and handle alerts.
author: Dakota Gordon

hideCanceledAlerts.title: Hide Canceled Alerts
hideCanceledAlerts.description: Hide alerts in the alert manager after they have been canceled or triggered.

confirmCancelAlert.title: Confirm Before Canceling Alerts
confirmCancelAlert.description: Show a confirmation windows before canceling an active alert.

notifyCreatedAlert.title: Notify On Created Alert
notifyCreatedAlert.description: Show a notification when an alert is successfully created.

notifyUpdatedAlert.title: Notify On Updated Alert
notifyUpdatedAlert.description: Show a notification when an alert is successfully updated.

notifyExpiredAlert.title: Notify On Expired Alert
notifyExpiredAlert.description: Show a notification when an alert expires before it is triggered.

notifyCanceledAlert.title: Notify On Canceled Alert
notifyCanceledAlert.description: Show a notification when an alert is canceled.

defaultExpiration.title: Default Alert Expiration
defaultExpiration.description: The default amount of time to wait until automatically expiring an alert.

defaultCooldown.title: Default Alert Cooldown
defaultCooldown.description: The default amount of time (in seconds) to wait before an active alert can be triggered again.

defaultCancelAfterTrigger.title: Default Cancel After Trigger
defaultCancelAfterTrigger.description: Default setting to cancel an alert after it triggers, so it will only trigger once.

defaultSendSMS.title: Default Send SMS
defaultSendSMS.description: Default setting to send an SMS when an alert is triggered (if phone number is verified).

defaultSendEmail.title: Default Send Email
defaultSendEmail.description: Default setting to send an Email when an alert is triggered (if email address is verified).
